summary: French Guiana is a region and department of France located in South America. It's bigger than most of France and has lots of forests, including the largest national park in the European Union. Most people live in the capital, Cayenne. It's ruled by a single assembly and is part of the European Union, using the euro as its currency. The economy relies heavily on the Guiana Space Centre. While French is the official language, many people speak French Guianese Creole. It's the only part of the Americas still ruled by a European country.
title: French Guiana
